concept.description: Marks all public methods with label Public
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Method) WHERE m.visibility='public' SET m:Public RETURN m.name

concept.description: Marks all protected methods with label Protected
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Method) WHERE m.visibility='protected' SET m:Protected RETURN m.name

concept.description: Marks all private methods with label Private
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Method) WHERE m.visibility='private' SET m:Private RETURN m.name

concept.description: Marks all private methods with label PackageProtected
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Method) WHERE m.visibility='default' SET m:PackageProtected RETURN m.name
